description: This file defines a React component for the Materials page in a Next.js frontend. It includes UI elements like a dropzone for file uploads, a list of uploaded files with statuses, and logic for handling file uploads using an API. The component manages state for files, upload status, and messages, and renders a user interface for uploading and viewing materials.

methods.name: onUpload
methods.description: Handles uploading selected files to the server, updating the UI to show processing status and final ready state.
